TopicTitle: TUFX Automation / Change profiles when certain conditions are met -- Would such thing be possible to make?

Articles.Content:
I have multiple profiles installed that fit different situations perfectly (Landed/Flying on Kerbin, LKO, Mün surface, et cetera) and changing profiles manually is a bit of a pain in the ass.

Would it be possible to create a tool that allowed you to specify the situation of your vessel in order to apply a certain profile for it?
